title: A late discourse made in a solemne assembly of nobles and learned men at Montpellier in France touching the cure of wounds by the powder of sympathy : with instructions how to make the said powder : whereby many other secrets of nature are unfolded / by Sr. Kenelme Digby, knight ; rendred faithfully out of French into English by R. White.
author: Digby, Kenelm, Sir, 1603-1665.
publisher: Printed for R. Lownes and T. Davies,
